level.heading: CHANGE OF BASE YEAR FOR COLUMBIA HOSPITAL FOR WOMEN, PROVIDENCE HOSPITAL ANDASHINGTON HOSPITAL CENTER (§ 29-967)

level.text: Columbia Hospital for Women, Providence Hospital and Washington Hospital Center’s Medicaid payment for inpatient services is based upon each hospital’s audited reimbursable cost per discharge for a base year period defined as the hospital’s fiscal year ending September 30, 1991.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: The authority for this section is D.C. Code, 2001 Ed. §1-307.02; and Commissioner’s Order 70-83 (March 6, 1970), as amended by Mayor’s Order 79-144 (July 11, 1979).

level.heading: EDITOR’S NOTE
level.text: This section was originally adopted as §970. It was renumbered by Final Rulemaking published at 45 DCR 2333, 2334 (April 17, 1998).
